title: To reduce the battery’s usage and extends its life, configure the power options in Windows

note: Click the Start button in the lower-left corner of Windows. 2. Click Shut Down. 3. In the drop-down menu, select Log Off.
title: For Windows XP Home Edition and XP Professional Edition 1. Click the Start button in the lower-left corner of Windows. 2. Click the Log Off button. 3. A window opens containing another Log Off button
